entry.title: Moms Are Like Buttons Lace Wall Hanger Included
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heritage Lace
Type: Lace Accents
Price: 19.99

Welcome Friends Lace Wall Hanger Included

DETAILS

  • Wall hanging measures 12" x 15"
  • May all who enter as guests leave as Friends
  • Graphic art transfer
  • Wire and wood hanger included
CARE & CONTENT

100% polyester. Machine wash cold, gentle. Do not bleach. Lay flat or hang to dry. Touch up with cool iron if desired.

entry.title: Birdhouse Note Pad with Gift Caddy and Trinket Tray Plus Designer Pen
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lissom
Type: notepads
Price: 13.99

Our Birdhouse Note Pad with Gift Caddy and Trinket Tray Plus Pen makes one heck of a gift slash favor item!! Featuring a beautiful Blue Jay and Hummingbird this packed full party bundle you are getting a Teacup shaped notepad fill with lovely roses perfect for lists, notes, and more!  Also included is a ceramic birdhouse shaped tray that can be used at parties for a tea bag rest or as a party favor as a trinket tray plus you getting a designer pen all wrapped up with a bow for the perfect gift giving item. 

Set size: 7.5" x 5.75" x 1". Pad size: 4.5" x 4.25", 75 sheets.

entry.title: Love Laugh Love Ceramic Wall Hanging Sign
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lissom
Type: Signs
Price: 13.99

Love Laugh Love Ceramic Wall Hanging Sign has beautiful poppies, resting bird, and dragonfly.  Each sign is embossed with a lovely scrolling design.  Our wire hanger is white and not yellow as shown. 

Measures: 8.5" Wide and 4.5" High

entry.title: Friendly Teacups Tea Wallet Fabric Tea Bag and Sweetener Envelope for the Purse - One of a Kind!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Moments in Thyme
Type: Tea Wallets
Price: 13.99

Our adorable tea wallets hold six t-sacs pre-filled with loose tea or six tea bags. 

  • High quality cotton fabric
  • Made in New Hampshire
  • Six slots for tea, plus four slots for sweeteners
  • Your tea is held securely in the wallet with a strong snap
  • Measures 3"x5" when folded closed
  • The attractive and tidy replacement for that plastic zip-lock baggie in the bottom of your bag!
  • EVERY tea lover needs one, every tea lover wants one!

entry.title: Susan Rios Rosie Mini Tea Art
entry.summary:
Vendor: Susan Rios
Type: Susan Rios Minis
Price: 16.99

From the Artist: 
I have taken some of my most popular original works and created fun, mini little prints for sale! This one features my granddaughter, Rosie,l wearing a precious pink outfit surrounded by a beautifully floral garden scene with glitter detail. Aprrox. dimensions 5x6 inch with hot pink hanging ribbon. Can frame them or hang them on walls, wine bottles, use for packaging/gift wrapping, etc. Get creative! These are very versatile, multipurpose mini art prints!!! SO CUTE! Comes in its own plastic packaging.

entry.title: Susan Rios Antique Pitcher with Roses Mini Tea Art
entry.summary:
Vendor: Susan Rios
Type: Susan Rios Minis
Price: 16.99

From the Artist: 
"Pitcher With Roses" is a print made from an original painting I did. The print is adhered to illustration board, and hangs from satin ribbons. It's 6.5" tall x 4.75" wide. Soft pink roses are in a crystal vase, and sit on a lace tablecloth. An antique pitcher sits on the dresser, with a pink hat decorated with roses hangs on the striped wallpaper behind.
Tie the ribbons in a pretty bow, and hang this lovely print anywhere. It makes a very special gift card, and would be beautiful for a birthday, wedding, or Mother's Day gift. It would be beautiful tied on a package too. A dusting of fine iridescent glitter makes it sparkle! Comes in a clear cello bag.

entry.title: Susan Rios Autumn Picnic Mini Tea Art
entry.summary:
Vendor: Susan Rios
Type: Susan Rios Minis
Price: 16.99

From the Artist: 
These little teddies are having an autumn picnic, and the black labrador is too, because he's hoping to get fed! The print, 5"x 6", is adhered to illustration board, and hangs from satin ribbons. Tie them in a pretty bow and hang this anywhere, tie it to a package or wine bottle for a gift tag, or put into an envelope and send a special gift card. A little glitter is added for seasonal sparkle!

entry.title: Susan Rios Jacquie's Autumn Mini Tea Art
entry.summary:
Vendor: Susan Rios
Type: Susan Rios Minis
Price: 16.99

From the Artist: 
This little print is from the original painting I did called "Jackie's Autumn". This is my favorite time of the year, so I love painting autumn images. The print, (5"x 7"), is mounted on illustration board, with ribbons coming from the top, to hang it. You can hang it on the wall as is, tie it on a package as a gift tag, put it in an envelope and send it as a special gift card ~ these are very versatile little art prints! This one also has a little sign in the front of the house that says "Give Thanks", so would be great for Thanksgiving too.

entry.title: Susan Rios Lyric Lovebirds and Flowers Mini Art
entry.summary:
Vendor: Susan Rios
Type: Susan Rios Minis
Price: 16.99

From the Artist: 
"Lyric Love" is a print made from an original painting I did. The print is adhered to illustration board, and hangs from satin ribbons. It's 4.75" tall x 4.75" wide. Soft pink blossoms surround two little bluebirds ~ a very sweet and romantic little print.
Tie the ribbons in a pretty bow, and hang this lovely print anywhere. It makes a very special gift card, and would be beautiful for a birthday, Mother's Day, or special friend gift. It would be beautiful tied on a package too. A dusting of fine iridescent glitter makes it sparkle! Comes in a clear cello bag."  USA MADE

entry.title: Susan Rios Easter Tea Mini Art
entry.summary:
Vendor: Susan Rios
Type: Susan Rios Minis
Price: 16.99

From the Artist:  "This is a little print from a painting I did. I take the print, which measures approx. 6.25"x 5", adhere it to illustration board, and pink satin ribbons come out from the top so it can be tied in a pretty bow and hung on the wall. It can also be hung around a wine bottle, or tied on a package as a gift tag, put in an envelope and sent as a special gift card, or even set on a pretty easel. It's also dusted with a little glitter for some fun sparkle. However you choose to use it, this cheery little Easter image will make you smile!"

entry.title: Tea Pot Birdhouse
entry.summary:
Vendor: Esschert
Type: Garden
Price: 37.99

Everybody loves a good tea party! The birds will especially love this one! Simply hang this dainty tea pot bird feeder and watch as the birds indulge!

entry.title: Heirloom Tea Susan Rios Keepsake Tea Art
entry.summary:
Vendor: Susan Rios
Type: Susan Rios
Price: 59.00

You can almost smell the heady scent of roses and lilacs in this romantic tea time painting!  A hand painted tea cup and matching vase are showcased on a delicate lace tablecloth and ready for your afternoon tea.  Perfect for a kitchen or dining room or small alcove.   10 x 6

Susan Rios has been a professional artist for over 30 years. You will find her romantic illustrations in many of Emilie Barnes Tea Books and her tranquil paintings in the homes of art collectors around the world.

Susan's focus is on peace, hope and beauty... Now you can add a bit of these qualities to every corner of your home!

We are so delighted to offer her line of "Keepsakes," which are smaller, affordable versions of her paintings.

The incredible richness of Susan's work is not adequately captured in our photos! Each piece of keepsake art is wrapped around the canvas creating a very elegant and finished look. These offerings are ready to hang or stand.

You are welcome to inquire about purchasing larger, limited editions, and originals of these pieces!

The inviting images of tea parties and gardens are sure to add a touch of romantic beauty to your home.

USA MADE

entry.title: Garden Roses Susan Rios Keepsake Tea Art
entry.summary:
Vendor: Susan Rios
Type: Susan Rios
Price: 59.00

A lacy curtain, a tiny bird, an elegant vase and a bouquet of pink roses combine to create a romantic and elegant piece of artwork for your home.  10 x 8
